website_summaries.verdict: This tray is like having your own mini-greenhouse for seedlings.
pros: Tray is strong and well made
Top fits well on the tray
Company makes many sizes of similar trays
Easy to clean and store for the next season
cons: These trays are more expensive than other options

customer_reviews.title: The most sturdy reusable trays available!
customer_reviews.text: I bought every size tray available from bootstrap. I have just a small heated indoor greenhouse and last year I had floor to ceiling racks with bootstrap trays full of veggies and flower plants. For cleanup I fill a garbage can with water and some bleach toss in my trays as I empty them for a quick disinfectant cleanup. I hope they come up with the 4 inch transplant containers as I get tired of paying for new ones every year. Best planting trays ever! Plus I love that they are made in the USA
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Thick and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: These trays are excellent. They are thick and sturdy. Much better than the flimsy ones you can buy other placrs. However, they do NOT fit regular 1020 trays. They sit above the lip of the tray so be careful when you water to make sure you're getting water high enough to wick into the tray
customer_reviews.author: Lexi H.

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy plastic. Great quality product, and great price if you need the volume.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Nye

customer_reviews.title: Tuff enough to NOT warp by sun's rays
customer_reviews.text: These are awesome. Other trays I had ordered were so frail and wimpy that the heat of the greenhouse caused them to warp. I am Ordering more.
customer_reviews.author: Cory Gilstrap

customer_reviews.title: Solidly built trays
customer_reviews.text: There were some people who suggested that the 128 cells are too thin, that's nonsense. These are very stable and well built. I wouldn't put a brick on these, and I would definitely hold in the center with two hands, but these should last quite a few seasons without any issue. They cells are nice and deep and the walls are sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Rivera

customer_reviews.title: 1 of 5  did not have drainage holes
customer_reviews.text: I honestly LOVE Bootstrap Farmer products, so I bought the 128 seeding starting tray this year and one of my tray kept runnning consistently dry... finally figured out the that’ll they do not have holes in the bottom. So instead of relying on bottom watering I needed to top water which I never thought to check. Was kind of a disappointment. Will drill holes so it’s useful... but that 128 holes. — ________ —
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I like to buy quality products for my gardening and I ...
customer_reviews.text: I did a lot of research before deciding to purchase these seed starting trays. Bootstrap Farmer seed trays are very well made and durable. They are the most durable that I have seen in the market. I like to buy quality products for my gardening and I am sure I will have many years of use from these. I am now waiting for the 1020 flat trays to come back in stock! I want more cell trays to add to my collection. Thank you for making a quality product and excellent packaging/shipping!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Kan

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy / Durable
customer_reviews.text: Super sturdy trays! By far the best quality! Super excited to start my seedlings 💛 128 is definitely the perfect size for seedlings. Not too small not too big. Packaging was nice, in a bigger box with wrap protecting the trays. Very happy with my purchase, thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs Gonzo

customer_reviews.title: I am impressed
customer_reviews.text: Did not expect this level of strength. The cell trays, do need a trim to fit the domes... was an easy fix. Very happy with the purchase !
customer_reviews.author: La Tri

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding!
customer_reviews.text: I was worried after I read some of the reviews but I believe that this seedling tray will last for several planting seasons. Much stronger that I expected.
customer_reviews.author: Parnelli

customer_reviews.title: TINY! Returned it. Can't transplant my peat moss ...
customer_reviews.text: TINY! Returned it. Can't transplant my peat moss starters into these because they are too small!
customer_reviews.author: RIKKI

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, will last a while
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy, will last a while. A few cells on the corners were cracked but not so much they won't work (extra drainage :) . It would have been nice to have something in between the flats. They were all packed snugly for shipping and were challenging to get appart/unstack. With the sharp plastic edges some tissue in between would have helped.
customer_reviews.author: LW

customer_reviews.title: Great quality trays
customer_reviews.text: Great quality trays. I used to work at a greenhouse and these are far better made. Not flimsy, very,very sturdy. You guys have done well !! These trays will last a long time !
customer_reviews.author: sosbourne

customer_reviews.title: Broken Corners on three out of ten trays
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy Trays, but three arrived damaged. They are marketed as tough, durable and reusable. We are short on time so using them, just dont like i had to use damaged trays.
customer_reviews.author: Penelope R.

customer_reviews.title: Extra Strength you bet it is!!!
customer_reviews.text: When this product says 'Extra Strength' it is very very strong. I can use these cells for years and will be sure to purchase more ASAP. Love this product and will buy more from Bootstrap Farmer.
customer_reviews.author: Frank Stranzl

customer_reviews.title: the BEST TRAYS
customer_reviews.text: The BEST TRAYS... I bought these for my suburban garden and I loved them deeply. Prior, I had only used the flimsy ones from big box retailers, and these were leaps and bounds! They don't break, they don't bend, they rock!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very Strong
customer_reviews.text: This is my second purchase from this company and I continue to be very happy with the products. I am just starting with a greenhouse and these cell trays helped a lot. Strong like they say, I will continue to use and purchase from Bootstrap farmer.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy R.

customer_reviews.title: Product received as described.
customer_reviews.text: Product received was as described. Trays and inserts are very sturdy. Package contents received undamaged. Will order again.
customer_reviews.author: Majahonke

customer_reviews.title: Strong and Sturdy!
customer_reviews.text: These trays are so sturdy! I will over time be replacing all my flimsy 1020 trays that so easily crack and break and will definitely be ordering these again. There was a slight odor but it does dissipate.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda N.

customer_reviews.title: A good product with good service
customer_reviews.text: As promised, these trays are sturdy- which, for me, makes an economical buy even better. The items shipped quickly, and I appreciated the follow up attention to my purchase. I’ll definitely keep this new start up company in mind the next time I need supplies for my own nursery.
customer_reviews.author: Troy Broussard

customer_reviews.title: Great heavy duty trays
customer_reviews.text: The weight of the tray was great, nice and heavy. I thought it would be sturdy but exceeded my expectations.
customer_reviews.author: Liliya Sadoma

customer_reviews.title: Damaged on arrival
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these last year as well with no problems but this time was different. The cells on the bottom two trays are damaged with some of the cells damaged beyond use. If I didn’t need these cells now for planting I would send them back.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly A. Boyle

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: They are heavy duty trays and should hold up to several plantings.
customer_reviews.author: Hank

customer_reviews.title: nice, very sturdy
customer_reviews.text: nice, very sturdy, can be reused. good. i would order a lower cell frequency next time but these are working fine.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis Jennings

customer_reviews.title: ... seed starting product and this one fits the bill nicely! Worth the extra $$$ to have a quality ...
customer_reviews.text: I have been searching for a high quality seed starting product and this one fits the bill nicely! Worth the extra $$$ to have a quality product that will last many seasons!
customer_reviews.author: Bones

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Much better than I expected... can be used over and over, very sturdy product.
customer_reviews.author: Jon K, VA

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: We think this is the best plug tray we have tried. Wish it was a little more affordable.
customer_reviews.author: Kent

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Love the quality of the product and look forward to using these for years.
customer_reviews.author: Robin

product_meta.title: Seed Starter Kit 128 Cell Extra Strength, 10 Pack - 1020 Tray, Humidity Dome, Plug Tray Starting Trays for Seedling Germination
feature_bullets: Ultra-Durable, High-Quality, 128 Cell Starter Tray KIT w/ Flat and Dome. Made to last many seasons
Domes and Trays are NOT flimsy or brittle. Won't crack or break while handling unlike competitors
Heavy Duty Humidity Dome 5" height (4.5" interior space). Built in vents for controlled airflow
Cell is 1" square by 1.25" deep. Outer Dimensions: 21.25" x 11.25" germination tray
Gift set Kit to get start growing seedlings. BPA Free Plastic Seed Starter Kits.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars81 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
